question: Who is the primary person responsible for the collection or creation of this data product?
name: Primary Data Producer: Name
help: Often this is the Principle Investigator, Project Scientist, or Project Manager
comments:
The form will need a way to let the user who is logged into EDPub and completing the form indicate if they are this role or not.
If  "same as" the logged in user, Autopopulate from EDLogin User Login, if "same as" the logged in user

question: n/a
name: Primary Data Producer: Organization
help: n/a

question: n/a
name: Primary Data Producer: Email
help: n/a

question: Who should the DAAC contact with questions regarding this data archival request?
name: Archival Request Point of Contact: Name
help: This person should have in-depth knowledge of this data product, allowing them to provide additional information as needed.
comments:
The form will need a way to let the user who is logged into EDPub and completing the form indicate if they are this role or not. 

If "same as" the logged in user, autopopulate from EDLogin User Login, 
OR  if "same as" Primary Data Producer,  autopopulate from Primary Data Producer values

question: n/a
name: Archival Request Point of Contact: Organization
help: n/a

question: n/a
name: Archival Request Point of Contact: Email
help: n/a

question: How do you refer to this data product?
name: Data product name
help: This is how the DAAC will refer to this data product during the Archival Interest process.

question: Please provide a brief description of this data product following the guidance in the help text.
name: Data product description
help: The description should mimic a journal abstract and should provide a reader with the information needed to quickly understand the relevance and usefulness of the data.

source: NASA, NOAA, NSF, USGS, University <free text>, Other <free text>
question: What organization(s) funded the creation of this data product?
name: Funding source: Organization
help: n/a

question: Under what program or program element within the funding organization was this data product created?
name: Funding source: Program/Program Element
help: For example, NASA programs such as MEaSUREs, Terrestrial Hydrology, Earth Venture, ACCESS, or AIST.

validation: Free text validated as number; dropdown value must be selected
question: What is the estimated or actual total volume of this data product?
name: Data product volume
type:
Free text (for number); 
Controlled: single choice (for units)
help: The DAAC uses the total volume of the final data product to plan data storage requirements. If the final data product is not complete, please provide your best estimate.

source: Date selection widget for start date and end date; For end date, also an option to say "on going"
question: What period of time is covered by the entire data product?
name: Data product temporal coverage
help: The temporal coverage should encompass the beginning date of the first data file and the ending date of the last data file, even if there are time gaps.

question: What is the general geographic region covered by this data product?
name: Spatial coverage
help: For example, Global, Northern Hemisphere, Alaska, Korean Peninsula, East Tropical Pacific, or Gulf Stream.

source: ASCII, GeoTIFF, HDF 5, HDF-EOS 5, OGC KML, NetCDF-4, NetCDF Classic, Other <free text>
question:
What is the format(s) of the files within this data product?

If selecting "Other", please upload code to read the data or provide a URL to code to read the data.
name: Data format
help:
For a list of NASA approved data formats, please refer to the NASA Earthdata Standards and Practices web page (https://earthdata.nasa.gov/esdis/eso/standards-and-references#data-formats).

Providing code to read non-standard data formats will assist the DAAC in understanding the structure and content of this data product.

question:
Can this data product be publicly released in compliance with NASA's Open Data Policy? 
If "No", please provide a brief explanation.
name: Data product restrictions
type:
Controlled: Single choice
If "No", text field.
help: For a description policy, please refer to the NASA Earthdata Data and Information Policy web page (https://earthdata.nasa.gov/collaborate/open-data-services-and-software/data-information-policy).
comments: I think this should be both Archival and Questionnaire, since the CMR requires an Abstract for the UMM-C

validation: Consider a reasonable character limit for this.
question: Please describe the science value of this data product.
name: Science value of data product
help: For example, how will this data product benefit the science community? What are the strengths and the limitations of this data product? What other data products does it compliment?

validation: Consider a reasonable character limit for this.
question: Please briefly explain your reasons for requesting archival of this data product at the DAAC.
name: Reason for submitting data product
help: For example, are you attempting to publish a paper which requires data to be archived in a trusted repository? Have you been instructed by a NASA program manager to submit your data to the DAAC? Do you want this data product archived with related data?

question: Do you have any dependencies related to this data product being approved for archival at the DAAC? If Yes, please provide a brief explanation.
name: Dependencies for archival approval
type:
Controlled: Single choice
If "Yes", then free text
help: For example, are you hoping to have this data product approved for archival at the DAAC prior publishing a paper or presenting at a conference? Does your project have a defined timeline in which this data product needs to be published?

source:
Yes, No
If Yes: daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly, ad-hoc
question:
Once this data product is publicly accessible, will you continue to create data to extend this data product? 
If "Yes", what is the anticipated frequency of additional data deliveries to the DAAC?
name: Data product status
type:
Controlled: Single choice
If "Yes", then Controlled: single choice
help: n/a

question: Please provide the citation or Digital Object Identifier (DOI) for any publications describing this data product.
name: Publication(s) describing the data product
help: For example, a overview paper describing the research, methods, or initial results related to this data product.

validation: Validate that file is uploaded OR text field populated; validate file(s) against file size limit
question: Please upload a sample data file(s) or provide a URL to a location where a sample data file(s) can be accessed.
name: Sample data file(s)
type: File upload widget for multiple files AND Free text
help:
Providing data files that are representative of the range of data within this data product will help the DAAC to better understand the data format, structure, and content. 

(need to display the file size limit)

validation: Validate file(s) against file size limit
question: Please upload additional documents that describe this data product or provide URLs to additional documents.
name: Data product additional documentation
type: File upload widget for multiple files AND Free text
help: For example, these documents may include descriptions of the variables, filename conventions, processing steps, and/or data quality.

question: If a Digital Object Identifier (DOI) already exists for this data product, please provide it.
name: Data product DOI
help: This would be a DOI for this data product and not for a publication related to this data product.
